attributes.contentHtml: Ples ok, i checked and they did change it, it was requiring to join 5 guilds monthly to get free hosting, the website is just an ad trash bin and anything you try to do will show an ad

attributes.title: Blare Host | Possibly using free trials | Banning people because staff wants to

attributes.contentHtml:
